image_analysis.description: The image is a completed United States Office of Government Ethics (OGE) Form 278e, an Executive Branch Personnel Public Financial Disclosure Report. The form is filled out for Donald J. Trump, identifying his position as President of the United States of America. It includes typed information for the filer's details and handwritten signatures and dates for certification and review sections. A document identifier, 'HOUSE_OVERSIGHT_010617', is visible at the bottom right corner.
image_analysis.layout: The document follows a standard government form structure. It has a header with the form title and issuing agency, a main body for filer information, and several sections at the bottom for certifications and reviews, each with designated spaces for signatures and dates.

text_extraction.full_text:
OGE Form 278e (March 2014)
U.S. Office of Government Ethics; 5 C.F.R. part 2634 | Form Approved: OMB No. (3209-0001)
Report Type:
Year (Annual Report only):
Date of Appointment/Termination: January 20, 2017

UNITED STATES OFFICE OF
GOVERNMENT ETHICS
★
Preventing Conflicts of Interest
in the Executive Branch

Executive Branch Personnel Public Financial Disclosure Report (OGE Form 278e)

Filer's Information
Last Name
Trump
First Name
Donald
MI
J
Position
President of the United States of America
Agency

Other Federal Government Positions Held During the Preceding 12 Months:
N/A

Name of Congressional Committee Considering Nomination (Nominees only):
N/A

Filer's Certification - I certify that the statements I have made in this report are true, complete and correct to the best of my knowledge:
Signature:
[Signature]
Date:
JUNE 14/2017

Agency Ethics Official's Opinion – On the basis of information contained in this report, I conclude that the filer is in compliance with applicable laws and regulations (subject to any comments below)
Signature:
Stefan C Passantino
Date:
June 14, 2017

Other Review Conducted By:

Date:

Signature:

Date:
6/16/17
